attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Dorrington Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dorrington Primary School must not close because:
- Dorrington School is a great school.
- The village is the hub of the surrounding largely rural area and rural areas need our care and protection.
- Dorrington school is a C of E aided school which are under huge threat from these closures.
- The school provides wrap around care.
- Dorrington is a main service village and no core development stratgey has been agreed by the forthcoming unitary authority.
